Headline: #75 74th-75th | Temporary East-bound Reroute near 75th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: East-bound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to,street blockage near75th/Greenwood..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
East-bound  #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to,street blockage near 75th/Greenwood..

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood, South Chicago and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near 75th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound # 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood, South Chicago and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near 75th/Greenwood.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge  at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
